item.title: Yune add a quote by Patricia A. McKillip
item.description:
"He closed his grade book and asked hopefully, "What inspired you? Was it Hawthorne?"
I stared at him. He had to be kidding." -- Patricia A. McKillip

item.title: Yune add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "He is slow, and the sea sings to us both, but he returns to me." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Yune add a quote by Alex Bellos
item.description: "Mathematicians have, according to Wright, been "unreasonably successful" in finding applications to apparently useless theorems, and often years after the theorems were first discovered." -- Alex Bellos

item.title: Yune add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Yune add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't get to choose if you get hurt in this world...but you do have some say in who hurts you. I like my choices." -- John Green

item.title: Yune add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I believe the universe wants to be noticed. I think the universe is inprobably biased toward the consciousness, that it rewards intelligence in part because the universe enjoys its elegance being observed. And who am I, living in the middle of history, to tell the universe that it-or my observation of it-is temporary?" -- John Green

item.title: Yune add a quote by John Green
item.description:
"You are fairly smart," I said after a while.
"You are fairly good at compliments," he answered." -- John Green

item.title: Yune add a quote by John Green
Yune add a quote by Elliott James
item.description: "Pinky: I've been in this kind of situation before. Fourth finger: I've felt these feelings before. Middle finger: I've survived them every time. Index finger: Everybody dies eventually. Thumb: That includes my enemies." -- Elliott James
